title: The Guys Compete In Bop It! Challenge + Is Amy Becoming A Helicopter Parent?
itunes:title: The Guys Compete In Bop It! Challenge + Is Amy Becoming A Helicopter Parent?
description:
Eddie, Lunchbox, and Ray bring back one of our favorite toys from the 90's in a Bop It! Challenge live on the air this morning. Bobby calls Amy out on being a helicopter parent with her son, and Bobby gives his ACM Award Highlights. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
